            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">编写程序展示一个学校院系结构：需求是这样，要在一个页面中展示出学校的院系组成，一个学校有多个学院，</font> <font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">一个学院有多个系。如图：</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-top:0.8500pt;"><span><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"><tr><td
            width="126.533" height="0"></td></tr><tr><td></td><td><img width="380" height="180"
                                                                       src="java_design_pattern.files/java_design_pattern84608.png"></td></tr></table></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:2.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span>
    </p>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-top:0.5500pt;"><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:5.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span>
    </p>
    <h2 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:46.9000pt;text-indent:-36.0000pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l104 level2 lfo131;"><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.0500pt;font-size:16.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>12.2<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"><tr><td
            width="126.533" height="0"></td></tr><tr><td></td><td><img width="136" height="239"
                                                                       src="java_design_pattern.files/java_design_pattern84611.png"></td></tr></table></span><a
            name="12.2传统方案解决学校院系展示(类图) "></a><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"><a
            name="_bookmark153"></a><a name="_bookmark153"></a><font
            face="Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular">传统方案解决学校院系展示</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;">(</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular">类图</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;">)</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"></span></h2>
    <h2 style="margin-top:0.6000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:46.9000pt;text-indent:-36.0000pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l104 level2 lfo131;"><a name="12.3传统方案解决学校院系展示存在的问题分析"></a><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.0500pt;font-size:16.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>12.3<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"><a
            name="_bookmark154"></a><a name="_bookmark154"></a><font face="Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular">传统方案解决学校院系展示存在的问题分析</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"></span></h2>
    <p class=MsoBodyText><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';mso-fareast-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:10.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span>
    </p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:24.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l32 level1 lfo132;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>1)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">将学院看做是学校的子类，系是学院的子类，这样实际上是站在组织大小来进行分层次的</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:24.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l32 level1 lfo132;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.1000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>2)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.1000pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">实际上我们的要求是</font> <font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">：在一个页面中展示出学校的院系组成，一个学校有多个学院，一个学院有多个系，</font> <font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">因</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p></div>
<span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><br clear=all
                                                                                                 style='page-break-before:always;mso-break-type:section-break'></span>
<div class="Section174"><p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-top:0.4000pt;margin-left:32.1500pt;line-height:24.4000pt;
mso-line-height-rule:exactly;"><span
        style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
        face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">此这种方案，不能很好实现的管理的操作，比如对学院、系的添加，删除，遍历等</font></span><span
        style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.4000pt;margin-right:28.7500pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l32 level1 lfo132;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.3000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>3)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.3000pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">解决方案：把学校、院、系都看做是组织结构，他们之间没有继承的关系，而是一个树形结构，可以更好的实</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.2000pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">现管理操作。</font> </span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:0.9500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">=&#62; </span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">组合模式</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <h2 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:46.9000pt;text-indent:-36.0000pt;text-align:left;
line-height:30.8500pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l104 level2 lfo131;"><a name="12.4组合模式基本介绍"></a><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.0500pt;font-size:16.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>12.4<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"><a
            name="_bookmark155"></a><a name="_bookmark155"></a><font
            face="Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular">组合模式基本介绍</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"></span></h2>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-left:10.9000pt;line-height:24.3500pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;"><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">基本介绍</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-top:0.5000pt;"><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:10.5000pt;">&nbsp;</span>
    </p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:28.5500pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l197 level1 lfo133;"><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.1000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>1)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:0.0500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">组合模式</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">（</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
font-size:12.0000pt;">Composite</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
letter-spacing:2.4000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
font-size:12.0000pt;">Pattern</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">），又叫部分整体模式，它创建了对象组的树形结构，将对象组合成树状结构以</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">表示</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">&#8220;</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">整体</font></span><b><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
font-weight:bold;font-size:12.0000pt;">-</span></b><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">部分</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">&#8221;</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">的层次关系。</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-top:0.7500pt;"><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:10.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span>
    </p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:24.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l197 level1 lfo133;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.1000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>2)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">组合模式依据树形结构来组合对象，用来表示部分以及整体层次。</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:23.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l197 level1 lfo133;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.1000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>3)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">这种类型的设计模式属于结构型模式。</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.4000pt;margin-right:27.8000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l197 level1 lfo133;"><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.1000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>4)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.1000pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">组合模式使得用户对单个对象和组合对象的访问具有一致性，即：组合能让客户以一致的方式处理个别对象以及组合对象</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-top:0.2500pt;"><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:10.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span>
    </p>
    <h2 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:46.9000pt;text-indent:-36.0000pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l104 level2 lfo131;"><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.0500pt;font-size:16.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>12.5<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"><tr><td
            width="99.1333" height="0"></td></tr><tr><td></td><td><img width="557" height="237"
                                                                       src="java_design_pattern.files/java_design_pattern85033.png"></td></tr></table></span><a
            name="_bookmark156"></a><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"><a
            name="12.5组合模式原理类图"></a><a name="_bookmark156"></a><font
            face="Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular">组合模式原理类图</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"></span></h2>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-top:0.7000pt;"><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';mso-fareast-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:11.5000pt;">&nbsp;</span>
    </p>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-top:0.0500pt;margin-left:34.9000pt;"><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">对原理结构图的说明</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">-</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">即</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">(</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">组合模式的角色及职责</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">)</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p></div>
<span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-weight:bold;font-size:12.0000pt;"><br clear=all
                                                                                           style='page-break-before:always;mso-break-type:section-break'></span>
<div class="Section175"><p class=21 style="margin-top:0.4000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:24.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l200 level1 lfo134;"><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.0500pt;font-weight:bold;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><span style='mso-list:Ignore;'>1)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><b><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-weight:bold;font-size:12.0000pt;">Component</span></b><b><span
        style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:0.5000pt;font-weight:bold;
font-size:12.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span></b><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:0.5000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">:</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:0.5500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">这是组合中对象声明接口，在适当情况下，实现所有类共有的接口默认行为</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:0.6000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">,</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:0.4500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">用于访问和管理</font></span><span
        style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-left:32.1500pt;line-height:23.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;"><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">Component</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:2.8500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">子部件</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">, Component &nbsp;</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">可以是抽象类或者接口</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:23.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l200 level1 lfo134;"><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.0500pt;font-weight:bold;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><span style='mso-list:Ignore;'>2)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><b><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-weight:bold;font-size:12.0000pt;">Leaf</span></b><b><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:0.9000pt;font-weight:bold;
font-size:12.0000pt;">&nbsp;: </span></b><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">在组合中表示叶子节点，叶子节点没有子节点</font></span><span

    <h2 style="margin-top:2.6000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:46.9000pt;text-indent:-36.0000pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l104 level2 lfo131;"><a name="12.8组合模式的注意事项和细节"></a><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.0500pt;font-size:16.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>12.8<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"><a
            name="_bookmark159"></a><a name="_bookmark159"></a><font
            face="Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular">组合模式的注意事项和细节</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"></span></h2>
    <p class=MsoBodyText><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';mso-fareast-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:10.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span>
    </p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:24.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l101 level1 lfo137;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>1)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">简化客户端操作。客户端只需要面对一致的对象而不用考虑整体部分或者节点叶子的问题。</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:23.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l101 level1 lfo137;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>2)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">具有较强的扩展性。当我们要更改组合对象时，我们只需要调整内部的层次关系，客户端不用做出任何改动</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">.</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.4000pt;margin-right:28.7500pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l101 level1 lfo137;"><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.1500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>3)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.1500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">方便创建出复杂的层次结构。客户端不用理会组合里面的组成细节，容易添加节点或者叶子从而创建出复杂的树形结构</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:23.0000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l101 level1 lfo137;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>4)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">需要遍历组织机构，或者处理的对象具有树形结构时</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">, </span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">非常适合使用组合模式</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">.</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:24.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l101 level1 lfo137;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.2500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>5)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.2500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">要求较高的抽象性，如果节点和叶子有很多差异性的话，比如很多方法和属性都不一样，不适合使用组合模式</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p></div>

margin-left:46.9000pt;text-indent:-36.0000pt;text-align:left;
line-height:31.9000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l168 level2 lfo138;"><a name="13.1影院管理项目"></a><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.0500pt;font-size:16.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>13.1<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"><a
            name="_bookmark161"></a><a name="_bookmark161"></a><font face="Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular">影院管理项目</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"></span></h2>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-left:34.9000pt;line-height:23.3000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;"><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">组建一个家庭影院：</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-top:0.4000pt;margin-right:64.0500pt;margin-left:34.9000pt;"><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">DVD </span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">播放器、投影仪、自动屏幕、环绕立体声、爆米花机</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">,</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">要求完成使用家庭影院的功能，其过程为：</font> <font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">直接用遥控器：统筹各设备开关</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-right:539.9500pt;margin-left:34.9000pt;"><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">开爆米花机放</font> <font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">下</font> <font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">屏</font> <font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">幕</font> <font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">开</font> <font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">投</font> <font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">影</font> <font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">仪</font> <font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">开音响</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>

    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.3000pt;margin-right:28.3000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;

mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">ClientTest</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:2.6500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:0.1000pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">的</font> </span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">main</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.1500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.2500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">方法中，创建各个子系统的对象，并直接去调用子系统</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">(</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">对象</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">)</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.1500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">相关方法，会造成调用过程混乱，没有清晰的过程</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:23.0000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l144 level1 lfo139;"><span
            style="font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.7500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>2)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:0.0500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">不利于在</font> </span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">ClientTest</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:2.9000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">中，去维护对子系统的操作</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;

line-height:23.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l144 level1 lfo139;"><span

            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>3)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:0.3500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">解决思路：定义一个高层接口，给子系统中的一组接口提供一个一致的界面</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:0.4000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">(</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:0.3000pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">比如在高层接口提供四个方法</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-left:32.1500pt;line-height:23.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;"><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">ready, play, pause, end )</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">，用来访问子系统中的一群接口</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.4000pt;margin-right:28.7500pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l144 level1 lfo139;"><span
            style="font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.7500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>4)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">也就是说</font> <font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">就是通过定义一个一致的接口</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">(</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">界面类</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.9500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">)</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.4000pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">，用以屏蔽内部子系统的细节，使得调用端只需跟这个接口发生调用，而无需关心这个子系统的内部细节</font> </span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:0.9500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">=&#62; </span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">外观模式</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>

line-height:30.8500pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l168 level2 lfo138;"><a name="13.4外观模式基本介绍"></a><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.0500pt;font-size:16.0000pt;"><span

            face="Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular">外观模式基本介绍</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"></span></h2>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-left:10.9000pt;line-height:24.3500pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;"><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">基本介绍</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-top:0.5000pt;"><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:10.5000pt;">&nbsp;</span>
    </p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0500pt;margin-right:28.1500pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l109 level1 lfo140;"><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.1500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>1)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">外观模式（</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
font-size:12.0000pt;">Facade</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">），也叫</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">&#8220;</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.0500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">过程模式：外观模式为子系统中的一组接口提供一个一致的界面，此模式定义了一个高层接口，这个接口使得这一子系统更加容易使用</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:27.7500pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l109 level1 lfo140;"><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.1500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>2)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.2000pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">外观模式通过定义一个一致的接口，用以屏蔽内部子系统的细节，使得调用端只需跟这个接口发生调用，而无需关心这个子系统的内部细节</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-top:0.2000pt;"><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:10.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span>

            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>13.5<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"><tr><td
            width="94.5333" height="0"></td></tr><tr><td></td><td><img width="476" height="220"

            name="_bookmark165"></a><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"><a
            name="13.5外观模式原理类图"></a><a name="_bookmark165"></a><font
            face="Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular">外观模式原理类图</font></span><span

<div class="Section188"><p class=21 style="margin-top:0.4000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:10.9000pt;text-indent:0.0000pt;text-align:left;
line-height:24.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l4 level1 lfo31;"><span
        style="font-family:Wingdings;letter-spacing:-0.0500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span style='mso-list:Ignore;'>&#216;<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
        style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.0500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">对类图说明</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">(</span><span
        style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
        face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">分类外观模式的角色</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">)</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.4000pt;margin-right:28.6500pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l114 level1 lfo141;"><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.1000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>1)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:0.0500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">外观类</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">(Facade</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:0.4500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">): </span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">为调用端提供统一的调用接口</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:0.6000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">, </span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">外观类知道哪些子系统负责处理请求</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">,</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">从而将调用端的请求代理给适当子系统对象</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>

font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">上安装软件的时候经常有一键安装选项</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.1500pt;

font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">），</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.2500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">还有就是手机的重启功能</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font

            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
