mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:2.9500pt;font-weight:bold;
font-size:12.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span></b><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">去创建</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:0.2500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span><b><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-weight:bold;font-size:12.0000pt;">MetaObject</span></b><b><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-weight:bold;font-size:12.0000pt;">&#9;</span></b><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">对象使用到外观模式</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:31.9000pt;text-indent:-21.0000pt;text-align:left;
line-height:24.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l119 level1 lfo144;"><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.1000pt;font-weight:bold;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><span style='mso-list:Ignore;'>2)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span><table cellpadding="0"
                                                                                                     cellspacing="0"><tr><td
            width="94.5333" height="0"></td></tr><tr><td></td><td><img width="638" height="242"
                                                                       src="java_design_pattern.files/java_design_pattern95005.png"></td></tr></table></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">代码分析</font></span><b><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-weight:bold;font-size:12.0000pt;">+Debug </span></b><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">源码</font></span><b><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-weight:bold;font-size:12.0000pt;">+</span></b><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">示意图</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.1000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:31.9000pt;text-indent:-21.0000pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l119 level1 lfo144;"><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.1000pt;font-weight:bold;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><span style='mso-list:Ignore;'>3)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">对源码中使用到的外观模式的角色类图</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p></div>
<span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:5.5000pt;"><br clear=all
                                                                                                style='page-break-before:always;mso-break-type:section-break'></span>
<div class="Section199">
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-top:0.9500pt;margin-bottom:0.0500pt;"><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:5.5000pt;">&nbsp;</span>
    </p>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-left:44.5500pt;"><img width="434" height="296"
                                                             src="java_design_pattern.files/java_design_pattern95044.png"><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:10.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span>
    </p>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-top:0.6500pt;"><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:9.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span>
    </p>
    <h2 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:46.9000pt;text-indent:-36.0000pt;text-align:left;
line-height:28.3500pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l168 level2 lfo138;"><a name="13.8外观模式的注意事项和细节"></a><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.0500pt;font-size:16.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>13.8<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"><a
            name="_bookmark170"></a><a name="_bookmark170"></a><font
            face="Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular">外观模式的注意事项和细节</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"></span></h2>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:23.3000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l21 level1 lfo145;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>1)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">外观模式对外屏蔽了子系统的细节，因此外观模式降低了客户端对子系统使用的复杂性</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:23.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l21 level1 lfo145;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>2)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">外观模式对客户端与子系统的耦合关系</font> </span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:1.4500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">- </span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">解耦，让子系统内部的模块更易维护和扩展</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:23.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l21 level1 lfo145;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.0500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>3)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.0500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">通过合理的使用外观模式，可以帮我们更好的划分访问的</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';color:rgb(255,0,0);
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">层次</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:23.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l21 level1 lfo145;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>4)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">当系统需要进行分层设计时，可以考虑使用</font> </span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">Facade</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:0.0500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">模式</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:23.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l21 level1 lfo145;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.1500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>5)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.1500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">在维护一个遗留的大型系统时，可能这个系统已经变得非常难以维护和扩展，此时可以考虑为新系统开发一个</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-left:32.1500pt;line-height:23.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;"><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">Facade </span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">类，来提供遗留系统的比较清晰简单的接口，让新系统与</font> </span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">Facade </span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">类交互，提高复用性</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.4000pt;margin-right:28.7500pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l21 level1 lfo145;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.2000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>6)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.2000pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">不能过多的或者不合理的使用外观模式，使用外观模式好，还是直接调用模块好。要以让系统有层次，利于维护为目的。</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p></div>
<span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:22.0000pt;"><br clear=all
                                                                                                      style='page-break-before:always;mso-break-type:section-break'></span>
<div class="Section200"><h1 align=center style="margin-right:17.9500pt;text-align:center;"><span style="position:absolute;z-index:-1;left:0px;
margin-left:94.5333px;margin-top:2.8667px;width:795.0000px;
height:1.0000px;"><img width="795" height="1" src="java_design_pattern.files/java_design_pattern95351.png"></span><span
        style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:22.0000pt;"><font
        face="Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular">第</font> </span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:22.0000pt;">14</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:22.0000pt;">&#9;</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:2.0500pt;
font-size:22.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular">章</font><a name="第 14 章享元模式"></a></span><span
        style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:22.0000pt;"><a
        name="_bookmark171"></a><font face="Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular">享元模式</font></span><span
        style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:22.0000pt;"></span></h1>
    <h2 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:46.9000pt;text-indent:-36.0000pt;text-align:left;
line-height:32.3500pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l113 level2 lfo146;"><a name="14.1展示网站项目需求"></a><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.0500pt;font-size:16.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>14.1<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"><a
            name="_bookmark172"></a><a name="_bookmark172"></a><font
            face="Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular">展示网站项目需求</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"></span></h2>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-top:0.3000pt;margin-right:28.7500pt;margin-left:10.9000pt;
text-indent:24.0000pt;"><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">小型的外包项目，给客户</font> </span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">A </span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">做一个产品展示网站，客户</font> </span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">A </span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">的朋友感觉效果不错，也希望做这样的产品展示网站，但是要求都有些不同：</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:31.9000pt;text-indent:-21.0000pt;text-align:left;
line-height:23.0000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l133 level1 lfo147;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>1)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">有客户要求以新闻的形式发布</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:31.9000pt;text-indent:-21.0000pt;text-align:left;
line-height:23.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l133 level1 lfo147;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>2)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">有客户人要求以博客的形式发布</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:31.9000pt;text-indent:-21.0000pt;text-align:left;
line-height:24.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l133 level1 lfo147;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>3)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">有客户希望以微信公众号的形式发布</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-top:0.7000pt;"><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:9.5000pt;">&nbsp;</span>
    </p>
    <h2 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:46.9000pt;text-indent:-36.0000pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l113 level2 lfo146;"><a name="14.2传统方案解决网站展现项目"></a><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.0500pt;font-size:16.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>14.2<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"><a
            name="_bookmark173"></a><a name="_bookmark173"></a><font
            face="Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular">传统方案解决网站展现项目</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"></span></h2>
    <p class=MsoBodyText><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';mso-fareast-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:10.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span>
    </p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:31.9000pt;text-indent:-21.0000pt;text-align:left;
line-height:24.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l79 level1 lfo148;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>1)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">直接复制粘贴一份，然后根据客户不同要求，进行定制修改</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:31.9000pt;text-indent:-21.0000pt;text-align:left;
line-height:23.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l79 level1 lfo148;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>2)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">给每个网站租用一个空间</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:31.9000pt;text-indent:-21.0000pt;text-align:left;
line-height:24.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l79 level1 lfo148;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>3)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"><tr><td
            width="94.5333" height="0"></td></tr><tr><td></td><td><img width="426" height="235"
                                                                       src="java_design_pattern.files/java_design_pattern95536.png"></td></tr></table></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">方案设计示意图</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-top:0.8500pt;"><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span>
    </p>
    <h2 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:46.9000pt;text-indent:-36.0000pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l113 level2 lfo146;"><a name="_bookmark174"></a><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.0500pt;font-size:16.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>14.3<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"><a
            name="_bookmark174"></a><a name="14.3传统方案解决网站展现项目-问题分析"></a><font face="Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular">传统方案解决网站展现项目</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;">-</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular">问题分析</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"></span></h2>
</div>
<span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.1500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><br clear=all style='page-break-before:always;mso-break-type:section-break'></span>
<div class="Section201"><p class=21 style="margin-top:1.8000pt;margin-right:28.7500pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l195 level1 lfo149;"><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.6000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
        style='mso-list:Ignore;'>1)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.1500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">需要的网站结构相似度很高，而且都不是高访问量网站，如果分成多个虚拟空间来处理，相当于一个相同网站的实例对象很多，造成服务器的资源浪费</font></span><span
        style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:28.7500pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l195 level1 lfo149;"><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.6000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>2)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.2000pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">解决思路：整合到一个网站中，共享其相关的代码和数据，对于硬盘、内存、</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">CPU</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.1000pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">、数据库空间等服务器资源都可以达成共享，减少服务器资源</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:23.0000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l195 level1 lfo149;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.6000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>3)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">对于代码来说，由于是一份实例，维护和扩展都更加容易</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:23.1500pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l195 level1 lfo149;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.6000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>4)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">上面的解决思路就可以使用</font> <font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">享元模式</font> <font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">来解决</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <h2 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:46.9000pt;text-indent:-36.0000pt;text-align:left;
line-height:31.5500pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l113 level2 lfo146;"><a name="_bookmark175"></a><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.0500pt;font-size:16.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>14.4<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"><a
            name="_bookmark175"></a><a name="14.4享元模式基本介绍"></a><font
            face="Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular">享元模式基本介绍</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"></span></h2>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-left:34.9000pt;line-height:23.3000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;"><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">基本介绍</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:23.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l245 level1 lfo150;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.1500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>1)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">享元模式（</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">Flyweight</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.0500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">Pattern</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">）</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:0.0500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;">&nbsp;<font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">也叫</font> <font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">蝇量模式</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:1.4500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">: </span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">运用共享技术有效地支持大量细粒度的对象</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.4000pt;margin-right:28.7500pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l245 level1 lfo150;"><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.1500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>2)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.2000pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">常用于系统底层开发，解决系统的性能问题。像数据库连接池，里面都是创建好的连接对象，在这些连接对象中有我们需要的则直接拿来用，避免重新创建，如果没有我们需要的，则创建一个</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:28.7500pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l245 level1 lfo150;"><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.1500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>3)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.1500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">享元模式能够解决重复对象的内存浪费的问题，当系统中有大量相似对象，需要缓冲池时。不需总是创建新对象，可以从缓冲池里拿。这样可以降低系统内存，同时提高效率</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:28.6500pt;margin-bottom:0.9000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l245 level1 lfo150;"><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.1500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>4)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">享元模式经典的应用场景就是池技术了，</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">String</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:1.3000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">常量池、数据库连接池、缓冲池等等都是享元模式的应用，享元模式是池技术的重要实现方式</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-left:31.9000pt;"><img width="309" height="245"
                                                             src="java_design_pattern.files/java_design_pattern96041.png"><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:10.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span>
    </p>
    <h2 style="margin-top:0.6500pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:46.9000pt;text-indent:-36.0000pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l113 level2 lfo146;"><a name="_bookmark176"></a><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.0500pt;font-size:16.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>14.5<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"><a
            name="14.5享元模式的原理类图"></a><a name="_bookmark176"></a><font
            face="Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular">享元模式的原理类图</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"></span></h2>
</div>
<span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';mso-fareast-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:2.0000pt;"><br
        clear=all style='page-break-before:always;mso-break-type:section-break'></span>
<div class="Section202">
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-top:0.7500pt;"><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';mso-fareast-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:2.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span>
    </p>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-left:34.9000pt;"><img width="509" height="243"
                                                             src="java_design_pattern.files/java_design_pattern96055.png"><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';mso-fareast-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:10.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span>
    </p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.7000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:10.9000pt;text-indent:0.0000pt;text-align:left;
line-height:24.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l4 level1 lfo31;"><span
            style="font-family:Wingdings;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span style='mso-list:Ignore;'>&#216;<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">对类图的说明</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-left:10.9000pt;line-height:23.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;"><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">对原理图的说明</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">-</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">即</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">(</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">模式的角色及职责</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">)</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.4000pt;margin-right:28.6500pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l93 level1 lfo151;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.6500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>1)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.1500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">FlyWeight</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:1.2000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">是抽象的享元角色</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:0.4500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">, </span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">他是产品的抽象类</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:0.4500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">, </span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">同时定义出对象的外部状态和内部状态</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">(</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:0.0500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">后面介绍</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:0.2500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">) &nbsp;</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">的接口或实现</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:23.0000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l93 level1 lfo151;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.6500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>2)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">ConcreteFlyWeight</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:2.9500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">是具体的享元角色，是具体的产品类，实现抽象角色定义相关业务</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:23.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l93 level1 lfo151;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.6500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>3)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">UnSharedConcreteFlyWeight</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:2.9500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">是不可共享的角色，一般不会出现在享元工厂。</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:24.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l93 level1 lfo151;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.6500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>4)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">FlyWeightFactory</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">&#9;</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">享元工厂类，用于构建一个池容器</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">(</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">集合</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">)</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">，</font> <font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">同时提供从池中获取对象方法</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-top:0.7000pt;"><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:9.5000pt;">&nbsp;</span>
    </p>
    <h2 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:46.9000pt;text-indent:-36.0000pt;text-align:left;
line-height:32.8000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l113 level2 lfo146;"><a name="14.6内部状态和外部状态"></a><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.0500pt;font-size:16.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>14.6<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"><a
            name="_bookmark177"></a><a name="_bookmark177"></a><font
            face="Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular">内部状态和外部状态</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"></span></h2>
    <p class=MsoBodyText align=justify style="margin-top:0.3500pt;margin-right:28.7500pt;margin-left:10.9000pt;
text-align:justify;text-justify:inter-ideograph;"><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.5000pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">比如围棋、五子棋、跳棋，它们都有大量的棋子对象，围棋和五子棋只有黑白两色，跳棋颜色多一点，所以棋子颜</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.7000pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">色就是棋子的内部状态；而各个棋子之间的差别就是位置的不同，当我们落子后，落子颜色是定的，但位置是变化的，所以棋子坐标就是棋子的外部状态</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-top:0.0500pt;"><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:11.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span>
    </p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:28.7500pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l42 level1 lfo152;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.6000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>1)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.1500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">享元模式提出了两个要求：细粒度和共享对象。这里就涉及到内部状态和外部状态了，即将对象的信息分为两个部分：内部状态和外部状态</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:23.0000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l42 level1 lfo152;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.6000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>2)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">内部状态指对象共享出来的信息，存储在享元对象内部且不会随环境的改变而改变</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:24.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l42 level1 lfo152;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.6000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>3)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">外部状态指对象得以依赖的一个标记，是随环境改变而改变的、不可共享的状态。</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p></div>
<span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.1500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><br clear=all style='page-break-before:always;mso-break-type:section-break'></span>
<div class="Section203"><p class=21 align=justify style="margin-top:1.8000pt;margin-right:28.7500pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:justify;
text-justify:inter-ideograph;mso-list:l42 level1 lfo152;"><span
        style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.6000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
        style='mso-list:Ignore;'>4)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.1500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">举个例子：围棋理论上有</font> </span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">361 </span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.1500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">个空位可以放棋子，每盘棋都有可能有两三百个棋子对象产生，因为内存空间有</font></span><span
        style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.3500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">限，一台服务器很难支持更多的玩家玩围棋游戏，如果用享元模式来处理棋子，那么棋子对象就可以减少到只有两个实例，这样就很好的解决了对象的开销问题</font></span><span
        style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-top:0.2500pt;"><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:10.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span>
    </p>

            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">&#8220;</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">元</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">&#8221;</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">表示对象</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.4000pt;margin-right:28.7500pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l143 level1 lfo155;"><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.2000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>2)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.2000pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">系统中有大量对象，这些对象消耗大量内存，并且对象的状态大部分可以外部化时，我们就可以考虑选用享元模式</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:23.0000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l143 level1 lfo155;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>3)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">用唯一标识码判断，如果在内存中有，则返回这个唯一标识码所标识的对象，用</font> </span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">HashMap/HashTable</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.2000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">存储</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:23.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l143 level1 lfo155;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>4)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">享元模式大大减少了对象的创建，降低了程序内存的占用，提高效率</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.4000pt;margin-right:28.0500pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l143 level1 lfo155;"><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.2000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>5)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.2000pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">享元模式提高了系统的复杂度。需要分离出内部状态和外部状态，而外部状态具有固化特性，不应该随着内部状态的改变而改变，这是我们使用享元模式需要注意的地方</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.2000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">.</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:23.0000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l143 level1 lfo155;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>6)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">使用享元模式时，注意划分内部状态和外部状态，并且需要有一个工厂类加以控制。</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:24.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l143 level1 lfo155;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>7)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">享元模式经典的应用场景是需要缓冲池的场景，比如</font> </span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">String</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.1500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">常量池、数据库连接池</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p></div>
<span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:22.0000pt;"><br clear=all
                                                                                                      style='page-break-before:always;mso-break-type:section-break'></span>
<div class="Section211"><h1 align=center style="margin-right:17.9500pt;text-align:center;line-height:42.3000pt;
mso-line-height-rule:exactly;"><span style="position:absolute;z-index:-1;left:0px;
margin-left:94.5333px;margin-top:2.8667px;width:795.0000px;
height:1.0000px;"><img width="795" height="1" src="java_design_pattern.files/java_design_pattern99982.png"></span><span
        style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:22.0000pt;"><font
        face="Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular">第</font> </span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:22.0000pt;">15</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:22.0000pt;">&#9;</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:2.0500pt;
font-size:22.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular">章</font><a name="第 15 章代理模式"></a></span><span
        style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:22.0000pt;"><a
        name="_bookmark181"></a><font face="Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular">代理模式</font></span><span
        style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:22.0000pt;"></span></h1>
    <h2 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:46.9000pt;text-indent:-36.0000pt;text-align:left;
line-height:32.1500pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l55 level2 lfo156;"><a name="_bookmark182"></a><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.0500pt;font-size:16.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>15.1<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"><a
            name="15.1代理模式(Proxy)"></a><a name="_bookmark182"></a><font face="Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular">代理模式</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;">(Proxy)</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"></span></h2>
    <h3 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:73.9000pt;text-indent:-48.8500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:30.9500pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l55 level3 lfo156;"><a name="_bookmark183"></a><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.1000pt;font-size:15.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>15.1.1<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:15.0000pt;"><a
            name="15.1.1代理模式的基本介绍"></a><a name="_bookmark183"></a><font
            face="Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular">代理模式的基本介绍</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:15.0000pt;"></span></h3>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-top:0.4000pt;"><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';mso-fareast-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:11.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span>
    </p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:28.7500pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l115 level1 lfo157;"><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-1.7000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>1)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.4500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">代理模式：为一个对象提供一个替身，以控制对这个对象的访问。即通过代理对象访问目标对象</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">.</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">这样做的好处是</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">:</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">可以在目标对象实现的基础上</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">,</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">增强额外的功能操作</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">,</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">即扩展目标对象的功能。</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:23.0000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l115 level1 lfo157;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-1.7000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>2)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">被代理的对象可以是远程对象、创建开销大的对象或需要安全控制的对象</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.4000pt;margin-right:28.0500pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l115 level1 lfo157;"><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-1.7000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>3)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">代理模式有不同的形式</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:0.2500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">, </span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:0.0500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">主要有三种</font> <font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">静态代理、动态代理</font> </span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">(JDK</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:0.2000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">代理、接口代理</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">)</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:0.4000pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">和</font> &nbsp;</span><b><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-weight:bold;font-size:12.0000pt;">Cglib</span></b><b><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:0.2500pt;font-weight:bold;
font-size:12.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span></b><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:0.3500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">代理</font> &nbsp;</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">(</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">可以在内存动态的创建对象，而不需要实现接口，</font> <font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">他是属于动态代理的范畴</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:1.4500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">) </span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">。</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:24.0000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l115 level1 lfo157;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-1.7000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>4)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">代理模式示意图</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-left:43.1500pt;"><img width="468" height="200"
                                                             src="java_design_pattern.files/java_design_pattern100238.png"><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:10.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span>
    </p>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-top:1.0000pt;"><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:8.5000pt;">&nbsp;</span>
    </p>
    <h2 style="margin-top:0.0500pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:46.9000pt;text-indent:-36.0000pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l55 level2 lfo156;"><a name="_bookmark184"></a><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.0500pt;font-size:16.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>15.2<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"><a
            name="_bookmark184"></a><a name="15.2静态代理"></a><font face="Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular">静态代理</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"></span></h2>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-top:0.4500pt;"><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';mso-fareast-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:10.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span>
    </p>
    <h3 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:73.9000pt;text-indent:-48.8500pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l55 level3 lfo156;"><a name="_bookmark185"></a><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.1000pt;font-size:15.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>15.2.1<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:15.0000pt;"><a
            name="15.2.1静态代码模式的基本介绍"></a><a name="_bookmark185"></a><font face="Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular">静态代码模式的基本介绍</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:15.0000pt;"></span></h3>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-top:0.4000pt;"><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';mso-fareast-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:11.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span>
    </p>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-top:0.0500pt;margin-right:28.7500pt;margin-left:10.9000pt;
text-indent:24.0000pt;"><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">静态代理在使用时</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">,</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">需要定义接口或者父类</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">,</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">被代理对象</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">(</span><span

line-height:28.1000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l55 level3 lfo156;"><a name="15.2.3静态代理优缺点"></a><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.1000pt;font-size:15.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>15.2.3<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:15.0000pt;"><a
            name="_bookmark187"></a><a name="_bookmark187"></a><font face="Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular">静态代理优缺点</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:15.0000pt;"></span></h3>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-top:0.0500pt;"><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';mso-fareast-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';

    </p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:31.9000pt;text-indent:-21.0000pt;text-align:left;
line-height:24.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l210 level1 lfo159;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>1)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">优点：在不修改目标对象的功能前提下</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">, </span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">能通过代理对象对目标功能扩展</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:31.9000pt;text-indent:-21.0000pt;text-align:left;
line-height:23.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l210 level1 lfo159;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>2)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">缺点：因为代理对象需要与目标对象实现一样的接口</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';

font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">），</font></span><span

            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.1500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">&#9;</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">Pattern)</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">，</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';

            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font

            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>

            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">简单说，模板方法模式</font> <font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">定义一个操作中的算法的骨架，而将一些步骤延迟到子类中，使得子类可以不改变一个算法的结构，就可以重定义该算法的某些特定步骤</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>

            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>

            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">针对源码的类图</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';

            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">说明层次关系</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">)</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
