<div class="Section234">
    <p class=MsoNormal style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;"><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:8.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span></p>
    <p class=MsoNormal style="margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-left:10.9000pt;text-indent:0.0000pt;"><img width="605"
                                                                                                      height="308"
                                                                                                      src="java_design_pattern.files/java_design_pattern109331.png"><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:10.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span></p>
    <p class=MsoNormal style="margin-top:0.0000pt;"><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span></p>
    <h2 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:46.9000pt;text-indent:-36.0000pt;text-align:left;
line-height:29.4500pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l193 level2 lfo165;"><a name="16.7模板方法模式的注意事项和细节"></a><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.0500pt;font-size:16.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>16.7<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"><a
            name="_bookmark205"></a><a name="_bookmark205"></a><font
            face="Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular">模板方法模式的注意事项和细节</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"></span></h2>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-top:0.3500pt;"><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';mso-fareast-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:10.5000pt;">&nbsp;</span>
    </p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:28.6500pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l253 level1 lfo172;"><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.4000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>1)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.3000pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">基本思想是：算法只存在于一个地方，也就是在父类中，容易修改。需要修改算法时，只要修改父类的模板方法或者已经实现的某些步骤，子类就会继承这些修改</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:23.0000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l253 level1 lfo172;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.4000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>2)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">实现了最大化代码复用。父类的模板方法和已实现的某些步骤会被子类继承而直接使用。</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.4000pt;margin-right:28.7500pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l253 level1 lfo172;"><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.4000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>3)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.2000pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">既统一了算法，也提供了很大的灵活性。父类的模板方法确保了算法的结构保持不变，同时由子类提供部分步骤的实现。</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:23.0000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l253 level1 lfo172;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.4000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>4)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">该模式的不足之处：每一个不同的实现都需要一个子类实现，导致类的个数增加，使得系统更加庞大</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:23.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l253 level1 lfo172;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.4000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>5)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">一般模板方法都加上</font> </span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">final </span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">关键字，</font> <font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">防止子类重写模板方法</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">.</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.4000pt;margin-right:28.9000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l253 level1 lfo172;"><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.4000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>6)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">模板方法模式使用场景：当要完成在某个过程，该过程要执行一系列步骤</font> <font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">，这一系列的步骤基本相同，但其个别步骤在实现时</font> <font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">可能不同，通常考虑用模板方法模式来处理</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p></div>
<span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:22.0000pt;"><br clear=all
                                                                                                      style='page-break-before:always;mso-break-type:section-break'></span>
<div class="Section235"><h1 align=center style="margin-right:17.9500pt;text-align:center;line-height:42.3000pt;
mso-line-height-rule:exactly;"><span style="position:absolute;z-index:-1;left:0px;
margin-left:94.5333px;margin-top:2.8667px;width:795.0000px;
height:1.0000px;"><img width="795" height="1" src="java_design_pattern.files/java_design_pattern109672.png"></span><span
        style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:22.0000pt;"><font
        face="Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular">第</font> </span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:22.0000pt;">17</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:22.0000pt;">&#9;</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:2.0500pt;
font-size:22.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular">章</font><a name="第 17 章命令模式"></a></span><span
        style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:22.0000pt;"><a
        name="_bookmark206"></a><font face="Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular">命令模式</font></span><span
        style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:22.0000pt;"></span></h1>
    <h2 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:46.9000pt;text-indent:-36.0000pt;text-align:left;
line-height:31.9000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l178 level2 lfo173;"><a name="17.1智能生活项目需求"></a><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.0500pt;font-size:16.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>17.1<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"><a
            name="_bookmark207"></a><a name="_bookmark207"></a><font
            face="Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular">智能生活项目需求</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"></span></h2>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-left:34.9000pt;line-height:24.3500pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;"><span><table
            cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"><tr><td width="126.533" height="0"></td></tr><tr><td></td><td><img
            width="505" height="159"
            src="java_design_pattern.files/java_design_pattern109693.png"></td></tr></table></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">看一个具体的需求</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=MsoBodyText><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span>
    </p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:28.6500pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l246 level1 lfo174;"><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.2500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>1)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.2000pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">我们买了一套智能家电，有照明灯、风扇、冰箱、洗衣机，我们只要在手机上安装</font> </span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">app</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:0.1000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">就可以控制对这些家电工作。</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:23.0000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l246 level1 lfo174;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.2500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>2)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">这些智能家电来自不同的厂家，我们不想针对每一种家电都安装一个</font> </span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">App</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">，分别控制，我们希望只要一个</font> </span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">app</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-left:32.1500pt;line-height:23.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;"><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">就可以控制全部智能家电。</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.4000pt;margin-right:28.6500pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l246 level1 lfo174;"><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.2500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>3)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">要实现一个</font> </span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">app </span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.3000pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">控制所有智能家电的需要，则每个智能家电厂家都要提供一个统一的接口给</font> </span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">app</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.1000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.4500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">调用，这时</font> <font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">就可以考虑使用命令模式。</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:23.0000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l246 level1 lfo174;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.2500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>4)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">命令模式可将</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">&#8220;</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">动作的请求者</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">&#8221;</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">从</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">&#8220;</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">动作的执行者</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">&#8221;</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">对象中解耦出来</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
font-size:12.0000pt;">.</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:23.1500pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l246 level1 lfo174;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.2500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>5)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">在我们的例子中，动作的请求者是手机</font> </span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">app</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">，动作的执行者是每个厂商的一个家电产品</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <h2 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:46.9000pt;text-indent:-36.0000pt;text-align:left;
line-height:31.5500pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l178 level2 lfo173;"><a name="17.2命令模式基本介绍"></a><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.0500pt;font-size:16.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>17.2<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"><a
            name="_bookmark208"></a><a name="_bookmark208"></a><font
            face="Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular">命令模式基本介绍</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"></span></h2>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.3500pt;margin-right:28.3000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l19 level1 lfo175;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-1.0000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>1)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.2500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">命令模式</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">（</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">Command</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:0.3500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.2500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">Pattern</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.2500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">）</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.3000pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">：在软件设计中，我们经常需要向某些对象发送请求，但是并不知道请求的接收者是谁，也不知道被请求的操作是哪个，</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-left:32.1500pt;line-height:23.0000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;"><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">我们只需在程序运行时指定具体的请求接收者即可，此时，可以使用命令模式来进行设计</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:23.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l19 level1 lfo175;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-1.0000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>2)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">命名模式使得请求发送者与请求接收者消除彼此之间的耦合，让对象之间的调用关系更加灵活，实现解耦。</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.4000pt;margin-right:28.7500pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l19 level1 lfo175;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-1.0000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>3)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">在命名模式中，会将一个请求封装为一个对象，以便使用不同参数来表示不同的请求</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">(</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">即命名</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">)</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">，同时命令模式也支持可撤销的操作。</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p></div>
<span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.2500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><br clear=all style='page-break-before:always;mso-break-type:section-break'></span>
<div class="Section236"><p class=21 style="margin-top:1.8000pt;margin-right:28.6500pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l19 level1 lfo175;"><span
        style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-1.0000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
        style='mso-list:Ignore;'>4)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.2500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">通俗易懂的理解：将军发布命令，士兵去执行。其中有几个角色：将军</font></span><span
        style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
        face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">（命令发布者</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.1500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">）</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.2000pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">、士兵</font></span><span
        style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
        face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">（命令的具体执行者）、命令</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">(</span><span
        style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
        face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">连接将军和士兵</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">)</span><span
        style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
        face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">。</font></span><span
        style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-right:28.3000pt;margin-left:32.1500pt;"><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">Invoker </span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">是调用者（将军），</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">Receiver </span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">是被调用者（士兵），</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">MyCommand </span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">是命令，实现了</font> </span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">Command </span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">接口，持有接收对象</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <h2 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:46.9000pt;text-indent:-36.0000pt;text-align:left;
line-height:31.9500pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l178 level2 lfo173;"><a name="_bookmark209"></a><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.0500pt;font-size:16.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>17.3<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"><a
            name="17.3命令模式的原理类图"></a><a name="_bookmark209"></a><font
            face="Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular">命令模式的原理类图</font></span><span

            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';mso-fareast-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:4.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span>
    </p>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-top:1.0000pt;"><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';mso-fareast-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';

line-height:24.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l4 level1 lfo31;"><span

            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font

    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;

line-height:23.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l242 level1 lfo176;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.2000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span

mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">Invoker </span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">是调用者角色</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;

line-height:23.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l242 level1 lfo176;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.2000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>2)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">Command:</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:2.8500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">是命令角色，需要执行的所有命令都在这里，可以是接口或抽象类</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>

            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.2000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>3)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">Receiver</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:1.4500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">: </span><span

            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>

line-height:23.1500pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l242 level1 lfo176;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.2000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>4)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">ConcreteCommand:</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';

mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">execute</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>

line-height:31.5500pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l178 level2 lfo173;"><a name="_bookmark210"></a><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.0500pt;font-size:16.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>17.4<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"><a

            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"></span></h2>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-left:34.9000pt;line-height:23.3000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;"><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">应用实例要求</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:31.9000pt;text-indent:-21.0000pt;text-align:left;
line-height:23.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l82 level1 lfo177;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>1)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">编写程序，使用命令模式</font> <font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">完成前面的智能家电项目</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;

    <h2 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:46.9000pt;text-indent:-36.0000pt;text-align:left;
line-height:29.4500pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l178 level2 lfo173;"><a name="17.6命令模式的注意事项和细节"></a><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.0500pt;font-size:16.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>17.6<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"><a
            name="_bookmark212"></a><a name="_bookmark212"></a><font
            face="Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular">命令模式的注意事项和细节</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"></span></h2>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-top:0.3500pt;"><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';mso-fareast-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:10.5000pt;">&nbsp;</span>
    </p>
    <p class=21 align=justify style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:28.5000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:justify;
text-justify:inter-ideograph;mso-list:l250 level1 lfo181;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-1.0000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>1)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.1500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">将发起请求的对象与执行请求的对象解耦。发起请求的对象是调用者，调用者只要调用命令对象的</font> </span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
font-size:12.0000pt;">execute()</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">方</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.2000pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">法就可以让接收者工作，而不必知道具体的接收者对象是谁、是如何实现的，命令对象会负责让接收者执行请</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.2500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">求的动作，也就是说：</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.4000pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;">&#8221;</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">请求发起者</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.2500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;">&#8221;</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.2500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">和</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">&#8220;</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">请求执行者</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.4000pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;">&#8221;</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.0500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">之间的解耦是通过命令对象实现的，命令对象起到了纽带桥梁的作用。</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:23.0000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l250 level1 lfo181;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-1.0000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>2)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">容易设计一个命令队列。只要把命令对象放到列队，就可以多线程的执行命令</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:23.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l250 level1 lfo181;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-1.0000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>3)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">容易实现对请求的撤销和重做</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:23.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l250 level1 lfo181;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-1.0000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>4)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">命令模式不足：可能导致某些系统有过多的具体命令类，增加了系统的复杂度，这点在在使用的时候要注意</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.4000pt;margin-right:27.8000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l250 level1 lfo181;"><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-1.0000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>5)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.2500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">空命令也是一种设计模式，它为我们省去了判空的操作。在上面的实例中，如果没有用空命令，我们每按下一个按键都要判空，这给我们编码带来一定的麻烦。</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:28.6000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l250 level1 lfo181;"><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-1.0000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>6)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:0.0500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">命令模式经典的应用场景：界面的一个按钮都是一条命令、模拟</font> </span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">CMD</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">（</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">DOS</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:1.7000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">命令）订单的撤销</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">/</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">恢复、触发</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">- </span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">反馈机制</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p></div>
<span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:22.0000pt;"><br clear=all

mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:22.0000pt;">&#9;</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:2.0500pt;
font-size:22.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular">章</font><a name="第 18 章访问者模式"></a></span><span
        style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:22.0000pt;"><a

    <h2 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:46.9000pt;text-indent:-36.0000pt;text-align:left;
line-height:31.9000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l88 level2 lfo182;"><a name="_bookmark214"></a><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.0500pt;font-size:16.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>18.1<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"><a
            name="_bookmark214"></a><a name="18.1测评系统的需求"></a><font face="Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular">测评系统的需求</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"></span></h2>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-left:34.9000pt;line-height:23.3000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;"><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">完成测评系统需求</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.4000pt;margin-right:28.7500pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l116 level1 lfo183;"><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.1500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>1)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"><tr><td
            width="126.533" height="0"></td></tr><tr><td></td><td><img width="407" height="120"
                                                                       src="java_design_pattern.files/java_design_pattern116169.png"></td></tr></table></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.0500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">将观众分为男人和女人，对歌手进行测评，当看完某个歌手表演后，得到他们对该歌手不同的评价</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">(</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:0.1000pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">评价</font> <font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">有不</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">同的种类，比如</font> <font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">成功、失败</font> <font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">等</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">)</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:23.2000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l116 level1 lfo183;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.1500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>2)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">传统方案</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <h2 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:46.9000pt;text-indent:-36.0000pt;text-align:left;
line-height:32.6500pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l88 level2 lfo182;"><a name="18.2传统方式的问题分析"></a><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.0500pt;font-size:16.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>18.2<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"><a
            name="_bookmark215"></a><a name="_bookmark215"></a><font
            face="Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular">传统方式的问题分析</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"></span></h2>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-top:0.3500pt;"><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';mso-fareast-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:10.5000pt;">&nbsp;</span>
    </p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:28.6500pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l128 level1 lfo184;"><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-2.6500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>1)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.3000pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">如果系统比较小，还是</font> </span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">ok </span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.6500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">的，但是考虑系统增加越来越多新的功能时，对代码改动较大，违反了</font> </span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">ocp</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:0.1000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:0.1000pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">原则，</font> <font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">不利于维护</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:23.0000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l128 level1 lfo184;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-2.6500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>2)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">扩展性不好，比如</font> <font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">增加了</font> <font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">新的人员类型，或者管理方法，都不好做</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:23.1500pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l128 level1 lfo184;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-2.6500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>3)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">引出我们会使用新的设计模式</font> </span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:0.6000pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;">&#8211; </span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">访问者模式</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <h2 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:46.9000pt;text-indent:-36.0000pt;text-align:left;
line-height:32.6500pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l88 level2 lfo182;"><a name="_bookmark216"></a><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.0500pt;font-size:16.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>18.3<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"><a
            name="18.3访问者模式基本介绍"></a><a name="_bookmark216"></a><font
            face="Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular">访问者模式基本介绍</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"></span></h2>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-top:0.3500pt;"><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';mso-fareast-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:10.5000pt;">&nbsp;</span>
    </p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:28.4000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l17 level1 lfo185;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.6500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>1)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">访问者模式（</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">Visitor</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.1500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">Pattern</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">），封装一些作用于某种数据结构的各元素的操作，它可以在不改变数据结构的前提下定义作用于这些元素的新的操作。</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:23.0000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l17 level1 lfo185;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.6500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>2)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">主要将数据结构与数据操作分离，解决</font> <font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">数据结构和操作耦合性问题</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:24.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l17 level1 lfo185;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.6500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>3)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">访问者模式的基本工作原理是：在被访问的类里面加一个对外提供接待访问者的接口</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-top:0.1500pt;"><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:10.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span>
    </p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l17 level1 lfo185;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.6500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>4)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">访问者模式主要应用场景是：需要对一个对象结构中的对象进行很多不同操作</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">(</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">这些操作彼此没有关联</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">)</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">，同时</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p></div>
<span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><br clear=all
                                                                                                 style='page-break-before:always;mso-break-type:section-break'></span>
<div class="Section251"><p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-top:0.4000pt;margin-left:32.1500pt;"><span
        style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
        face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">需要避免让这些操作</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">"</span><span
        style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font

            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>1)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span

            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">具体元素对访问者公布细节，也就是说访问者关注了其他类的内部细节，这是迪米特法则所不建议的</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:0.4000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">, </span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">这样造成了具体元素变更比较困难</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:23.0000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l240 level1 lfo189;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>2)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">违背了依赖倒转原则。访问者依赖的是具体元素，而不是抽象元素</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:24.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l240 level1 lfo189;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>3)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">因此，如果一个系统有比较稳定的数据结构，又有经常变化的功能需求，那么访问者模式就是比较合适的</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">.</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p></div>

    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-top:0.3000pt;margin-right:22.7500pt;margin-left:10.9000pt;
text-indent:24.0000pt;"><span><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"><tr><td width="126.533" height="0"></td></tr><tr><td></td><td><img

font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">编写程序展示一个学校院系结构：需求是这样，要在一个页面中展示出学校的院系组成，一个学校有多个学院，</font> <font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">一个学院有多个系。如图：</font></span><span

            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:6.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span></p>
    <h2 style="margin-top:0.4000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;

            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.0500pt;font-size:16.0000pt;"><span

            face="Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular">传统的方式的问题分析</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"></span></h2>
    <p class=MsoBodyText><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';mso-fareast-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:10.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span>
    </p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:24.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l231 level1 lfo191;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>1)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">将学院看做是学校的子类，系是学院的子类，这样实际上是站在组织大小来进行分层次的</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.4000pt;margin-right:28.7500pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l231 level1 lfo191;"><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.1000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>2)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.1000pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">实际上我们的要求是</font> <font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">：在一个页面中展示出学校的院系组成，一个学校有多个学院，一个学院有多个系，</font> <font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">因此这种方案，不能很好实现的遍历的操作</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-top:0.7500pt;"><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:10.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span>
    </p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:24.1500pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l231 level1 lfo191;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>3)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">解决方案：</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:0.9500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">=&#62; </span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">迭代器模式</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <h2 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:46.9000pt;text-indent:-36.0000pt;text-align:left;
line-height:31.5500pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l219 level2 lfo190;"><a name="19.4迭代器模式基本介绍"></a><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.0500pt;font-size:16.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>19.4<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"><a
            name="_bookmark224"></a><a name="_bookmark224"></a><font
            face="Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular">迭代器模式基本介绍</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"></span></h2>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-left:34.9000pt;line-height:24.3500pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;"><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">基本介绍</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p></div>
<span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><br clear=all
                                                                                                 style='page-break-before:always;mso-break-type:section-break'></span>
<div class="Section261"><p class=21 style="margin-top:0.4000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:24.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l65 level1 lfo192;"><span
        style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.2000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
        style='mso-list:Ignore;'>1)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
        style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
        face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">迭代器模式（</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">Iterator Pattern</span><span
        style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
        face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">）是常用的设计模式，属于行为型模式</font></span><span
        style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.4000pt;margin-right:22.7500pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l65 level1 lfo192;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.2000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>2)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.1000pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">如果我们的集合元素是用不同的方式实现的，有数组，还有</font> </span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">java</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:0.0500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.3000pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">的集合类，或者还有其他方式，当客户端要遍</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.6000pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">历这些集合元素的时候就要使用多种遍历方式，而且还会暴露元素的内部结构，可以考虑使用迭代器模式解决。</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:27.1500pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l65 level1 lfo192;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.2000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>3)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.3000pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">迭代器模式，提供一种遍历集合元素的统一接口，用一致的方法遍历集合元素，不需要知道集合对象的底层表示，即：不暴露其内部的结构。</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <h2 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:46.9000pt;text-indent:-36.0000pt;text-align:left;
line-height:31.9500pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l219 level2 lfo190;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.0500pt;font-size:16.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>19.5<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"><tr><td
            width="132.733" height="0"></td></tr><tr><td></td><td><img width="441" height="303"
                                                                       src="java_design_pattern.files/java_design_pattern120691.png"></td></tr></table></span><a
            name="19.5迭代器模式的原理类图"></a><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"><a
            name="_bookmark225"></a><a name="_bookmark225"></a><font
            face="Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular">迭代器模式的原理类图</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"></span></h2>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-top:0.8000pt;"><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';mso-fareast-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:11.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span>
    </p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:10.9000pt;text-indent:0.0000pt;text-align:left;
line-height:24.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l4 level1 lfo31;"><span
            style="font-family:Wingdings;letter-spacing:-0.0500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span style='mso-list:Ignore;'>&#216;<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.0500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">对原理类图的说明</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">-</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">即</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">(</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">迭代器模式的角色及职责</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">)</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:23.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l191 level1 lfo193;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.2000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>1)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">Iterator </span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">：</font> <font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">迭代器接口，是系统提供，含义</font> </span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">hasNext,</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.1500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">next, remove</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';

    <h2 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
