mso-list:l219 level2 lfo190;"><a name="19.8迭代器模式的注意事项和细节"></a><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.0500pt;font-size:16.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>19.8<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"><a
            name="_bookmark228"></a><a name="_bookmark228"></a><font
            face="Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular">迭代器模式的注意事项和细节</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"></span></h2>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-top:1.0500pt;"><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';mso-fareast-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:9.5000pt;">&nbsp;</span>
    </p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:10.9000pt;text-indent:0.0000pt;text-align:left;
line-height:24.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l4 level1 lfo31;"><span
            style="font-family:Wingdings;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span style='mso-list:Ignore;'>&#216;<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">优点</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:23.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l5 level1 lfo196;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>1)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">提供一个统一的方法遍历对象，客户不用再考虑聚合的类型，使用一种方法就可以遍历对象了。</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:23.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l5 level1 lfo196;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>2)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">隐藏了聚合的内部结构，客户端要遍历聚合的时候只能取到迭代器，而不会知道聚合的具体组成。</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.4000pt;margin-right:22.1500pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l5 level1 lfo196;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.1000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>3)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.1000pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">提供了一种设计思想，就是一个类应该只有一个引起变化的原因</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">（叫做单一责任原则</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.4000pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">）</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.2000pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">。在聚合类中，我们把</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.6500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">迭代器分开，就是要把管理对象集合和遍历对象集合的责任分开，这样一来集合改变的话，只影响到聚合对象。而如果遍历方式改变的话，只影响到了迭代器。</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:24.0000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l5 level1 lfo196;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>4)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">当要展示一组相似对象，或者遍历一组相同对象时使用</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:1.4500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">, </span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">适合使用迭代器模式</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p></div>
<span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><br clear=all

<div class="Section275"><p class=21 style="margin-top:0.4000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:10.9000pt;text-indent:0.0000pt;text-align:left;
line-height:24.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l4 level1 lfo31;"><span
        style="font-family:Wingdings;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
        style='mso-list:Ignore;'>&#216;<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
        style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
        face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">缺点</font></span><span
        style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-left:34.9000pt;line-height:24.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;"><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">每个聚合对象都要一个迭代器，会生成多个迭代器不好管理类</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p></div>
<span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:22.0000pt;"><br clear=all

        style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:22.0000pt;"><font
        face="Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular">第</font> </span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:22.0000pt;">20</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:22.0000pt;">&#9;</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:2.0500pt;
font-size:22.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular">章</font><a name="第 20 章观察者模式"></a></span><span
        style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:22.0000pt;"><a
        name="_bookmark229"></a><font face="Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular">观察者模式</font></span><span
        style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:22.0000pt;"></span></h1>
    <h2 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:46.9000pt;text-indent:-36.0000pt;text-align:left;
line-height:33.4500pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l48 level2 lfo197;"><a name="20.1天气预报项目需求,具体要求如下："></a><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.0500pt;font-size:16.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>20.1<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"><a
            name="_bookmark230"></a><a name="_bookmark230"></a><font
            face="Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular">天气预报项目需求</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;">,</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular">具体要求如下：</font></span><span

mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">)</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">，容易混乱</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.4000pt;margin-right:28.7500pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l194 level1 lfo209;"><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>4)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">当系统增加一个新的电器对象时</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.6000pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">，</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">或者执行流程改变时</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.6000pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">，</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">代码的可维护性</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.6000pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">、</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">扩展性都不理想</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">&#9;</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">考虑中介者模式</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p></div>
<span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"><br clear=all

<div class="Section292"><h2 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:46.9000pt;text-indent:-36.0000pt;text-align:left;
line-height:32.7000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l145 level2 lfo207;"><a name="21.4中介者模式基本介绍"></a><span
        style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.0500pt;font-size:16.0000pt;"><span
        style='mso-list:Ignore;'>21.4<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
        style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"><a
        name="_bookmark243"></a><a name="_bookmark243"></a><font
        face="Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular">中介者模式基本介绍</font></span><span
        style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"></span></h2>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-left:34.9000pt;line-height:24.3500pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;"><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">基本介绍</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-top:0.5000pt;"><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:10.5000pt;">&nbsp;</span>
    </p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:27.8000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l135 level1 lfo210;"><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.1500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>1)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">中介者模式（</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">Mediator</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:1.3000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">Pattern</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">），用一个中介对象来封装一系列的对象交互。中介者使各个对象不需要显式地相互引用，从而使其耦合松散，而且可以独立地改变它们之间的交互</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:23.0000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l135 level1 lfo210;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.1500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>2)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">中介者模式属于行为型模式，使代码易于维护</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.4000pt;margin-right:28.1500pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l135 level1 lfo210;"><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.1500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>3)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">比如</font> </span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">MVC</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.1000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">模式，</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">C</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">（</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">Controller</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.1500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">控制器</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.5000pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">）</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:0.1000pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">是</font> </span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">M</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">（</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">Model </span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">模型</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.5000pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">）</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:0.1000pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">和</font> </span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.2500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">V</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.2500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">（</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.2500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">View</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.1500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">视图</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.5000pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">）</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.1000pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">的中介者，在前后端交互时起到了中间人的作用</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <h2 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:46.9000pt;text-indent:-36.0000pt;text-align:left;
line-height:31.9500pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l145 level2 lfo207;"><a name="21.5中介者模式的原理类图"></a><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.0500pt;font-size:16.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>21.5<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"><a
            name="_bookmark244"></a><a name="_bookmark244"></a><font
            face="Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular">中介者模式的原理类图</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"></span></h2>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-top:0.0500pt;"><span><table cellpadding="0" cellspacing="0"><tr><td
            width="150.067" height="0"></td></tr><tr><td></td><td><img width="318" height="124"
                                                                       src="java_design_pattern.files/java_design_pattern134139.png"></td></tr></table></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';mso-fareast-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:6.5000pt;">&nbsp;</span>
    </p>
    <p class=MsoBodyText><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';mso-fareast-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:10.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span>
    </p>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-top:0.2000pt;"><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';mso-fareast-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:8.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span>
    </p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:10.9000pt;text-indent:0.0000pt;text-align:left;
line-height:22.5000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l4 level1 lfo31;"><span
            style="font-family:Wingdings;letter-spacing:-0.0500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span style='mso-list:Ignore;'>&#216;<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.0500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">对原理类图的说明</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">-</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">即</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">(</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">中介者模式的角色及职责</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">)</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:23.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l25 level1 lfo211;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.0500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>1)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">Mediator</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:2.9000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">就是抽象中介者</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">,</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">定义了同事对象到中介者对象的接口</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:23.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l25 level1 lfo211;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.0500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>2)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">Colleague </span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">是抽象同事类</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:23.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l25 level1 lfo211;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.0500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>3)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">ConcreteMediator</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:0.3500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:0.3500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">具体的中介者对象</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:0.1500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">, </span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:0.3500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">实现抽象方法</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:0.2000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">, </span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:0.3500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">他需要知道所有的具体的同事类</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:0.3500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">,</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:0.3000pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">即以一个集合来管理</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-left:32.1500pt;line-height:23.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;"><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">HashMap,</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">并接受某个同事对象消息，完成相应的任务</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.4000pt;margin-right:22.4000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l25 level1 lfo211;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.0500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>4)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">ConcreteColleague</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:0.0500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">具体的同事类</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-4.3500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">，</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">会有很多</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';

            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>21.7<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span

            name="_bookmark246"></a><a name="21.7中介者模式的注意事项和细节"></a><font face="Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular">中介者模式的注意事项和细节</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"></span></h2>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-top:0.1000pt;"><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';mso-fareast-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:10.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span>
    </p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:31.9000pt;text-indent:-21.0000pt;text-align:left;
line-height:24.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l36 level1 lfo213;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>1)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">多个类相互耦合，会形成网状结构</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">, </span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">使用中介者模式将网状结构分离为星型结构，进行解耦</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:31.9000pt;text-indent:-21.0000pt;text-align:left;
line-height:23.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l36 level1 lfo213;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>2)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">减少类间依赖，降低了耦合，符合迪米特原则</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:31.9000pt;text-indent:-21.0000pt;text-align:left;
line-height:23.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l36 level1 lfo213;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';color:rgb(255,0,0);font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>3)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';color:rgb(255,0,0);
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">中介者</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">承担了较多的责任，一旦中介者出现了问题，整个系统就会受到影响</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:31.9000pt;text-indent:-21.0000pt;text-align:left;
line-height:24.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l36 level1 lfo213;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>4)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">如果设计不当，中介者对象本身变得过于复杂，这点在实际使用时，要特别注意</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p></div>

    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-top:0.3000pt;margin-right:28.6500pt;margin-left:10.9000pt;
text-indent:24.0000pt;"><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">游戏角色有攻击力和防御力，在大战</font> </span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">Boss </span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">前保存自身的状态</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">(</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">攻击力和防御力</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">)</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">，当大战</font> </span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">Boss </span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">后攻击力和防御力下降，从备忘录对象恢复到大战前的状态</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>

            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">一个对象，就对应一个保存对象状态的对象，</font> <font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">这样当我们游戏的对象很多时，不利于管理，开销也很大</font></span><span

            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">传统的方式是简单地做备份，</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';

            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">）</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.1000pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">在不破坏封装性的前提下，捕获一个对象的内部状态，并在该对象之外保存这个状态。这样以后就可将该对象恢复到原先保存的状态</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p></div>

font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">可以这里理解备忘录模式：现实生活中的备忘录是用来记录某些要去做的事情，或者是记录已经达成的共同意</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.4000pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">见的事情，以防忘记了。而在软件层面，备忘录模式有着相同的含义，备忘录对象主要用来记录一个对象的某种状态，或者某些数据，当要做回退时，可以从备忘录对象里获取原来的数据进行恢复操作</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>

            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">备忘录模式属于行为型模式</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>

    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;

            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>1)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">给用户提供了一种可以恢复状态的机制，可以使用户能够比较方便地回到某个历史的状态</font></span><span

    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;

line-height:23.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l110 level1 lfo218;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>2)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">实现了信息的封装，使得用户不需要关心状态的保存细节</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:23.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l110 level1 lfo218;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>3)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">如果类的成员变量过多，势必会占用比较大的资源，而且每一次保存都会消耗一定的内存</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:1.4500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">, </span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font

            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>23.3<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"><a
            name="_bookmark258"></a><a name="_bookmark258"></a><font
            face="Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular">解释器模式基本介绍</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"></span></h2>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-left:34.9000pt;line-height:23.3000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;"><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">基本介绍</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.4000pt;margin-right:28.7500pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l22 level1 lfo222;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-1.0000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>1)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.2000pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">在编译原理中，一个算术表达式通过词法分析器形成词法单元，而后这些词法单元再通过语法分析器构建语法分析树，最终形成一颗抽象的语法分析树。这里的词法分析器和语法分析器都可以看做是解释器</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>

            name="23.7解释器模式的注意事项和细节"></a><a name="_bookmark262"></a><font face="Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular">解释器模式的注意事项和细节</font></span><span

    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.3500pt;margin-right:28.7500pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;

font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">当有一个语言需要解释执行，可将该语言中的句子表示为一个抽象语法树，就可以考虑使用解释器模式，让程序具有良好的扩展性</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:23.0000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l118 level1 lfo230;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.6000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>2)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">应用场景：编译器、运算表达式计算、正则表达式、机器人等</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.4000pt;margin-right:28.7500pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l118 level1 lfo230;"><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.6000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>3)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.1500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">使用解释器可能带来的问题：解释器模式会引起类膨胀、解释器模式采用递归调用方法，将会导致调试非常复杂、效率可能降低</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.1500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">.</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p></div>

    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;

            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">）：它主要用来解决对象在多种状态转换时，需要对外输出不同的行为的问题。状态和行为是一一对应的，状态之间可以相互转换</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>

font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">当一个对象的内在状态改变时，允许改变其行为，这个对象看起来像是改变了其类</font></span><span

    <h2 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:46.9000pt;text-indent:-36.0000pt;text-align:left;
line-height:28.4500pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l39 level2 lfo231;"><a name="_bookmark269"></a><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.0500pt;font-size:16.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>24.6<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"><a
            name="_bookmark269"></a><a name="24.6状态模式的注意事项和细节"></a><font face="Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular">状态模式的注意事项和细节</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"></span></h2>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:23.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l225 level1 lfo246;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>1)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">代码有很强的可读性。状态模式将每个状态的行为封装到对应的一个类中</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.4000pt;margin-right:28.1500pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l225 level1 lfo246;"><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.1500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>2)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.1500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">方便维护。将容易产生问题的</font> </span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">if-else</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:0.2000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.1500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">语句删除了，如果把每个状态的行为都放到一个类中，每次调用方法时都要判断当前是什么状态，不但会产出很多</font> </span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">if-else</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.0500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">语句，而且容易出错</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:23.0000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l225 level1 lfo246;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>3)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">符合</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">&#8220;</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">开闭原则</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">&#8221;</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">。容易增删状态</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:23.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l225 level1 lfo246;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>4)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">会产生很多类。每个状态都要一个对应的类，当状态过多时会产生很多类，加大维护难度</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.4000pt;margin-right:22.7500pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l225 level1 lfo246;"><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.6500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>5)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.6500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">应用场景：当一个事件或者对象有很多种状态，状态之间会相互转换，对不同的状态要求有不同的行为的时候，</font> <font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">可以考虑使用状态模式</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p></div>
<span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:22.0000pt;"><br clear=all

font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">这算法体现了几个设计原则，第一、把变化的代码从不变的代码中分离出来；第二、针对接口编程而不是具体类（定义了策略接口）；第三、多用组合</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.2000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">/</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.2000pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">聚合，少用继承（客户通过组合方式使用策略）。</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>

    <h2 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:46.9000pt;text-indent:-36.0000pt;text-align:left;
line-height:28.4500pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l158 level2 lfo247;"><a name="25.8策略模式的注意事项和细节"></a><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.0500pt;font-size:16.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>25.8<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"><a
            name="_bookmark278"></a><a name="_bookmark278"></a><font
            face="Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular">策略模式的注意事项和细节</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"></span></h2>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:23.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l98 level1 lfo254;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>1)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">策略模式的关键是：分析项目中变化部分与不变部分</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:23.4000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l98 level1 lfo254;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>2)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">策略模式的核心思想是：多用组合</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">/</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">聚合</font> <font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">少用继承；用行为类组合，而不是行为的继承。更有弹性</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.4000pt;margin-right:22.7500pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l98 level1 lfo254;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.6500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>3)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.6500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">体现了</font>&#8220;对修改关闭，对扩展开放&#8221;原则，客户端增加行为不用修改原有代码，只要添加一种策略</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">（或者行为）</font> </span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">即可，避免了使用多重转移语句（</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
font-size:12.0000pt;">if..else</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
letter-spacing:-0.3500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
font-size:12.0000pt;">if..else</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">）</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:28.5000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l98 level1 lfo254;"><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>4)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">提供了可以替换继承关系的办法：</font> <font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">策略模式将算法封装在独立的</font> </span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">Strategy</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:0.1000pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">类中使得你可以独立于其</font> </span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">Context </span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">改变它，使它易于切换、易于理解、易于扩展</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:24.0000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l98 level1 lfo254;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>5)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">需要注意的是：每添加一个策略就要增加一个类，当策略过多是会导致类数目庞</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p></div>

            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">审批人</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">)</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">完成审批。</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 align=justify style="margin-top:0.4000pt;margin-right:28.5000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;

            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.0500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span

mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">switch) &nbsp;</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">来对不同的采购请求处理，</font> <font

font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">如下问题</font> </span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';

mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:0.0500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.0500pt;

mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">(2)</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';

            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">客户端必须明确的知道</font> &nbsp;<font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">有多少个审批级别和访问</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;

            name="_bookmark283"></a><a name="_bookmark283"></a><font

            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans Mono CJK JP Regular';font-size:16.0000pt;"></span></h2>
    <p class=MsoBodyText style="margin-left:10.9000pt;line-height:23.3000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;"><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">基本介绍</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.4000pt;margin-right:28.1500pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l249 level1 lfo257;"><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-1.3500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>1)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.3000pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">职责链模式</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">（</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">Chain of Responsibility</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:0.0500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">&nbsp;</span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.1500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">Pattern</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.1500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">）</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:0.0500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">, </span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.1500pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">又叫</font> <font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">责任链模式，为请求创建了一个接收者对象的链</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">(</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">简单示意图</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;">)</span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">。这种模式对请求的发送者和接收者进行解耦。</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:28.7500pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
mso-list:l249 level1 lfo257;"><span style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-1.3500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>2)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.1000pt;
font-size:12.0000pt;"><font face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">职责链模式通常每个接收者都包含对另一个接收者的引用。如果一个对象不能处理该请求，那么它会把相同的请求传给下一个接收者，依此类推。</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>
    <p class=21 style="margin-top:0.0000pt;margin-right:0.0000pt;margin-bottom:0.0000pt;
margin-left:32.1500pt;text-indent:-21.2500pt;text-align:left;
line-height:24.0000pt;mso-line-height-rule:exactly;mso-list:l249 level1 lfo257;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-1.3500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>3)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">这种类型的设计模式属于行为型模式</font></span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>

            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:9.5000pt;">&nbsp;</span>

            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font

mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"></span></p>

mso-list:l86 level1 lfo258;"><span
            style="font-family:'Times New Roman';letter-spacing:-0.0500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;"><span
            style='mso-list:Ignore;'>2)<span>&nbsp;</span></span></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';

mso-bidi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';letter-spacing:-0.2500pt;font-size:12.0000pt;">&nbsp;, </span><span
            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';

            style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';font-size:12.0000pt;"><font
            face="Noto Sans CJK JP Regular">是具体的处理者</font></span><span style="mso-spacerun:'yes';font-family:'Times New Roman';mso-hansi-font-family:'Noto Sans CJK JP Regular';
